final_answer:
The humor in this image arises from the contrast between the idealized and the realistic outcomes of baking. On the left, the cookbook presents a beautifully illustrated cake with strawberries, promising a perfect result. On the right, the reality shows a less-than-perfect cake and a pile of dirty dishes in the sink.

The title "YES, BUT" further accentuates this contrast. "YES," you can follow the recipe and make a cake, "BUT" it comes with the messy aftermath that recipes often don't highlight. This juxtaposition humorously captures the common discrepancy between expectations and reality when cooking.
